name: Poverty is a Choice
description: I get it, you are poor and that's humiliating. Stop being poor, idiot.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit + Processor: Any Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: An internet connection is not required for this game (beyond what Steam insists) but it will help a lot
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel i-7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
